ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter
Class RemoteUserImpl

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter.RemoteUserImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MutableRemoteUser, RemoteUser
public class RemoteUserImpl
extends Object
implements MutableRemoteUser

Default implementation of the RemoteUser interface. The RemoteUserImpl passes most requests directly to a wrapped RemoteUserProxy instance.
